description: Freshly-squeezed from real limes!  It does not have any sugar added, and so would be too sour for drinking.  It is useful for making cocktails, however.
Freshly-squeezed from real lemons!  It does not have any sugar added, and so would be too sour for drinking.  It is useful for making cocktails, however.
Water with a small amount of bleach added to it with the purpose of disinfecting it.  It is safe to drink, but tastes and smells unpleasantly of chlorine.
